title: The Way Down: God, Greed, and the Cult of Gwen Shamblin
description:
Tig and Cheryl bow down before the refrigerator, as they binge on the HBOMax diet-cult docuseries "The Way Down: God, Greed, and the Cult of Gwen Shamblin". Also, we're doing a LIVE STREAMING SHOW on NOV 11! Get your tickets at loopedlive.com! *this episode spills beans* buy merch at podswag.com/truestory (tigandcheryltruestory@gmail.com)
